001package org.eldependenci.rpc.protocol;
002
003import org.eldependenci.rpc.context.RPCError;
004import org.eldependenci.rpc.context.RPCPayload;
005
006import java.lang.reflect.Type;
007
008public interface ServiceHandler {
009
010    Response invokes(RPCPayload payload) throws Exception;
011
012    Object finalizeType(Object result, Type returnType) throws Exception;
013
014    boolean shouldCallAsync(RPCPayload payload) throws Exception;
015
016    RPCError toRPCError(Exception e, boolean debug);
017
018    record Response(Object result, Type returnType){
019    }
020
021}
